version_description:
Join the dynamo Diana Jones on a new adventure!
Follow her to the distant island to find and retrieve the Emerald Skull of Zomderthals. The only problem is... A gang of marauders is after the ancient artifact, too! Will Diana and Zombie get the Skull first and leave the island unharmed?

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

A new island means new adventures!

- Visit the wise Druids and find out why spring is not coming to the islands.

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Is the mystery of Zone 52 revealed? What does Professor fail to mention in his urgent message?
Head to the distant desert to investigate the mysterious incident. You'll get all the details when you arrive!

*Space adventures are available to everyone, but only for a limited amount of time. Hurry!

The Big Love Theory!

- Everyone adores the talented scientist Zeldon! Will he be able to derive the formula of love? Not without your help!

- Don't miss! Z. Chief called on Cupid for help. Next week open the game every day and get gifts and prizes from both!

- New items available at the Market! Buy cute zombastic decorations and outfits to celebrate Valentine's Day!

A new island means new adventures!

- Zombie musicians, best of hits, and the coolest performance venue. The first spring concert of The Zom Beez will be off the charts!

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Dragons everywhere!
Once a year the winged creatures from the Island of Dragons fulfill the most cherished desires of zombies. Make a wish and pull anchor!

A new island means new adventures!

- Zombie musicians, best of hits, and the coolest performance venue. The first spring concert of The Zom Beez will be off the charts!

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Have a zombastic St. Patrick's!

- Get Patrick's Hat at the Market and find Pots of gold every 3 hours. Wanna keep in touch with the luckiest zombie? Buy Patrick's statue and enjoy his blessing.

- JAZZLAND: Zombie musicians, best of hits, and the coolest performance venue. On with the show?
Great news, friends! Сonnect to the Internet every day to get special gifts from Z.Chief.

Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates!

- The Easter adventures await Zombie on the Island of Surprises.

- Brace yourself for the hard-boiled fun! Color festive eggs and build the Easter tower to turn it into a huge heap of gifts. More painted eggs bring better rewards!

- Set up the new decorations before the holiday ends!

Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates!

- The Easter adventures await Zombie on the Island of Surprises.

- Brace yourself for the hard-boiled fun! Color festive eggs and build the Easter tower to turn it into a huge heap of gifts. More painted eggs bring better rewards!

- Set up the new decorations before the holiday ends!

- Minor fixes.

Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates!

- The Easter adventures await Zombie on the Island of Surprises.

- Brace yourself for the hard-boiled fun! Color festive eggs and build the Easter tower to turn it into a huge heap of gifts. More painted eggs bring better rewards!

- Set up the new decorations before the holiday ends!

- Performance improvements.

- Advertising SDKs are updated.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

A new story about dreams, brilliance, and striving for stars is waiting for you!

- Reach the abandoned Spaceport* to find out who sent Zombie the Mayday call and learn the secret of the corn fields!

*- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

A new story about dreams, brilliance, and striving for stars is waiting for you!

- Reach the abandoned Spaceport to find out who sent Zombie the Mayday call and learn the secret of the corn fields!

- Advertising SDKs are updated.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Advertising SDKs are updated.

A new story of beacons, ghosts and greed.

- Fascinating adventures at sea and legends of the cursed treasures await you in the Haunted Bay.

- It's become easier to find our other games! Just open the Settings inside the game. Thank you for choosing us!

Note: The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

- Fascinating adventures at sea and legends of the cursed treasures await you in the Haunted Bay.

- Collections are easier to use now: exchange one or ten sets in one tap.

- It's become easier to find our other games! Just open the Settings inside the game. Thank you for choosing us!

- Minor fixes.

Great news, friends!

Participate in the spring regatta to get the Winner's Cup. Become the captain of a paper boat and plough the impetuous creeks boldly!

Great news, friends!

- Participate in the spring regatta to get the Winner's Cup. Become the captain of a paper boat and plough the impetuous creeks boldly!

- Minor fixes.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Advertising SDKs are updated.

New lands and story about Samurai’s way are awaiting for you!

- Take part in a traditional tea ceremony and help Zombie find his true calling!

- Find a Trader on the new island to buy goods at bargain prices from him.

New lands and story about Samurai’s way are awaiting for you!

- Take part in a traditional tea ceremony and help Zombie find his true calling!

- Find a Trader on the new island to buy goods at bargain prices from him.

- Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Olé, Olé, Olé!
Go to the Soccer Island and witness the hottest match of this summer - the title game of the World Cup!

Olé, Olé, Olé!
- Go to the Soccer Island and witness the hottest match of this summer - the title game of the World Cup!

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

A new island means new adventures!

- Professor's Mansion turned into a crime scene! Help Zombie solve the mystery of the lost collection and track down the criminal to become a real sleuth.

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

A new island means new adventures!

- Professor's Mansion turned into a crime scene! Help Zombie solve the mystery of the lost collection and track down the criminal to become a real sleuth.

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

- Minor fixes.

Behold! The amazing story-teller, the one and only Don Sanchez with the chilling story of summer, Santa, and ice-cream.

Get Cinema tickets for each completed task to exchange them for unique decorations later.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Advertising SDKs are updated.

The adventures of Sherlock and Zombie continue!

- As Zombinapur reveals its secrets to the brave detectives, the treasures of the First Zombies get closer.

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

A new island means new adventures!

- Join Zombie on his trip to the Coiney Island and be the first who will see the new wonder of the world.

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!
- A thorny path to creating a masterpiece and workshops from the best jewelers await Zombie in the new adventure!
The adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Zombie are coming to an end! Find out what secrets the Paskerville residents hide and what haunts the famous detective.

- The adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Zombie are coming to an end. Find out what secrets the Paskerville residents hide and what haunts the famous detective.

- Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Already turned human and found Amy? It's time to find out the origin of zombies!

- Remote lands, unexpected twists, and new mysteries await you in Zombie Castaways!

- Head to the Faraway Island and learn where it all started!

Already turned human and found Amy? It's time to find out the origin of zombies!

- Remote lands, unexpected twists, and new mysteries await you in Zombie Castaways.

- Head to the Faraway Island and learn where it all started!

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Falling leaves and a romantic autumn story await Zombie in the new adventure!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

- The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

- Minor fixes.

Halloween at Zombies'!

- Ghoulie’s enrollment at the prestigious Witch Academy is at stake! Will she pass all the tests and fend off ghosts? Let's give her a hand!

- Hurry up and buy outfits for Zombie! The offer is limited!

- Catch restless ghosts to get a reward!

Halloween at Zombies'!

Ghoulie’s enrollment at the prestigious Witch Academy is at stake! Will she pass all the tests and fend off ghosts? Let's give her a hand!

Hurry up and buy outfits for Zombie! The offer is limited!

Catch restless ghosts to get a reward!

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

A new island means new adventures!

You never know where a blueprint found in the attic might take you. Perhaps, to a renowned inventor who needs your help with his dream project.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Advertising SDKs are updated.
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Holiday update!

- In the new version Oops tries hard to destroy holidays. Join the devs in pursuit of the malicious Oops and help save Christmas. Travel through 12 festive islands. Meet old foes and save good friends; face your past, break the evil spell, and dress... the Christmas Rocket. You have 30 days to complete all 12 locations. Have fun!

- This Christmas Z. Chief called on Santa for help. Next 3 weeks open the game every day and get gifts and prizes from both!

- Z. Chief and the devs are online! Now important news and messages come directly to your inbox, Z-MAIL.

The holiday goes on!

- Finally! The first snow has come, and right on time! Now Zombie can enjoy the snowfall over the holidays!

- Zombie is in for winter fun! Enjoy slopes and trails of a cozy, yet mysterious village!

- New items available at the Market! Buy cute zombastic decorations and outfits to celebrate Valentine's Day!

Journey Past Forward!

- Amy's getting closer to cracking the mystery of her transformation into a zombie.

- Travel across two new locations to dig into a life story of Zombie's love!

Do you know who makes the best lemonade? Maybe you know if you can walk on the rainbow? No? Then pack your bags, we're going to the Leprechaun Island!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Does your zombie restaurant need a makeover? Fewer visitors come, and the menu got old? Then the Paradise Kitchen is coming to you!

Let's celebrate Zombie Castaways' birthday together!
A week of fun and adventures for everyone! Special daily bonus, costumes, and gifts are waiting for you!

It's open season on safari trips!
We invite you on a fascinating journey around the Safari Island! Lots of emotions, amazing animals and colors of wild nature. Hurry, the offer is limited!

Any science fans around?
Attend Zympozium, a scientific conference with interactive expositions and workshops from leading scientists.

Join Starzie in the new space adventure! Head to a distant planet and find out who and why sends a distress signal.

The League of Extraordinary Zombies requires your immediate presence on the new timed location. This is your chance to prove yourself worthy of the elite club. Measure up to League's high standards, meet an old friend… and solve a crime!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Celebrate with us! Gifts from Z.Chief to celebrate Vizor's Birthday!
Help Rita organize an unusual event, gather old friends, and write your names down in the giant Book of Zombie Records!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Keep calm and play on! Take part in an exciting adventure and stand up to your worst nightmares. Those who can fight their fears will get the main prize!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

A deceived friend, a stolen painting and an insidious fraud... Nothing can keep Zombie away from this case!
Head to the Art Valley to retrieve Leo's lost masterpiece and teach the thief a lesson!

Thousands of tourists flock to the frozen miracle land every year... Head to the Glacier Island and explore hot springs and dormant geysers with Zombie!

Hurry up to celebrate Halloween in Zombie Castaways!

- One of Zombie's friends is crazy about ghosts and monsters. Follow him to the Monstrous Island and unravel the mystery of the local outlandish creatures.

- Buy zombastic Halloween outfits and decorations! The festive goodies are available at the Market until November 3.

- Open the game every day and get spooky bonuses for Halloween!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Zombie decided to invite his friends over to a Thanksgiving Dinner. Little did he know that he was in for a surprise! Mutant-plants meddling with his plans? Hurry and help our friend out on Farmers Island!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

- Advertising SDKs are updated.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

A bunch of crooks are planning to meddle with Zombie's Christmas spirit! Get ready for a zombastic Christmas & teach those unwanted guests a lesson!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Zombie sets out on a Space Odyssey!
Take part in the Zolian holiday challenges and activate a special hourglass to make sure 2020 begins!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

PARTY ISLAND
Zombie's most killer New Year party is over, with no memories left whatsoever! Head to a new island and help Zombie recollect everything that happened on New Year's eve! Adventure starts now!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

PARTY ISLAND
Zombie's most killer New Year party is over, with no memories left whatsoever! Head to a new island and help Zombie recollect everything that happened on New Year's eve! Adventure starts now!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

LUNAR VALLEY
Lunar New Year celebration is coming, but Ghoulie's not ready yet! Head to the Lunar Valley and help her and Zombie arrange a noisy show and light up festive fireworks!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Advertising SDKs are updated.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

ISLAND OF MEMORIES
What is hidden on the Island of Memories? Follow Zombie and his new friends Lora and John to the new island and learn a story of a very unusual find!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

GENIE'S ISLAND
Genie materialized on one of the zombie islands! The locals overestimated his magic powers, though... Head to a new island and find out why the famous magician is not that popular here!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

GENIE'S ISLAND
Genie materialized on one of the zombie islands! The locals overestimated his magic powers, though... Head to a new island and find out why the famous magician is not that popular here!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!
- Advertising SDKs are updated.

SUNNY COAST
The climate change impact or an unknown magic power? Follow Zombie and his friend Rita to the Sunny Coast to find out what caused the bizarre cold wave on one of the warmest islands!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Tortuga ahead! Big update in Zombie Castaways!
- Explore the faraway islands of zombie world and find treasure chests!
- Upgrade pirate ships and work your way up from a sailor to corsair!
- Complete sea wolves' commissions in the local Tavern.
- Find materials in faraway islands to build on Tortuga.

Tortuga and Fortune Island!
Unlock Tortuga, upgrade ships and work your way up from a sailor to corsair in Zombie Castaways big pirate adventure!
Or head to the Fortune Island to learn the secret of good fortune, make a very unusual pair of boots, and find the legendary Four-leaf clover!

Tortuga and Fortune Island!
Unlock Tortuga, upgrade ships and work your way up from a sailor to corsair in Zombie Castaways big pirate adventure!
Or head to the Fortune Island to learn the secret of good fortune, make a very unusual pair of boots, and find the legendary Four-leaf clover!
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Tortuga and Fortune Island!
Unlock Tortuga, upgrade ships and work your way up from a sailor to corsair in Zombie Castaways big pirate adventure!
Or head to the Fortune Island to learn the secret of good fortune, make a very unusual pair of boots, and find the legendary Four-leaf clover!
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Someone is constantly feeling sad in Zombie's universe :( But our friend has got a few cute jokes and pranks in stock for them! Cheer up gloomy zombies from the Sadville Island and leave them several hilarious keepsakes!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Celebrating Easter with Zombie! Participate in a festive quest and solve fun riddles to find the Golden Egg! Follow the white rabbit to the Riddle Island!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Follow Zombie to the Island of Books! Help famous authors overcome writer's block and come up with new bestsellers!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Zombie is up to another adventure! Head to the new island to unleash your best qualities, participate in a jousting tournament, and earn the title of zombie knight!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

Tortuga update!
Hire deckhands and prepare your cannons to clean up islands faster than ever!
Bigger ships and even more unсharted islands! Build a huge Caravel and get ready for new expeditions!

Zombie's friend Rita is going on a business trip and needs someone to look after her cat Nautilus and dog Klaus.
Zombie is ready to help: he loves pets! Yet he won't handle these fur rascals alone.
Join him on the Pets Island and try yourself as a pet nanny!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.
Smoother, faster game play due to bug fixes and stability improvements.

It's Zombie's birthday! This year, his friends are throwing a surprise party on Strangewood Island!
Head to the new land and join the party with balloons, pinata, and... a detective quest!
Festive mini-game is waiting! Play Match-3 together with Zombie and win amazing gifts!
*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

It's Zombie's birthday! This year, his friends are throwing a surprise party on Strangewood Island!
Head to the new land and join the party with balloons, pinata, and... a detective quest!
Festive mini-game is waiting! Play Match-3 together with Zombie and win amazing gifts!
*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

Zombie is going to visit his friend Leo on Stuff Island! Any idea why its called that?
Leo loves collecting stuff, but he has just too much of it. Help him clean up and give his old things a new life!

*The new island is available for everyone but for a limited period of time! Don't waste a minute!

- Advertising SDKs are updated.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Any music lovers here? You're going to create the most legendary record ever! Join Zombie on his journey to Vinyl Island and help two famous record producers make every music fan's dream come true!
